title: Jerome Messier, 38, Beaver Dam
maintext:
Jerome M. Messier, 38, Beaver Dam, passed away unexpectedly on July 26, 2018. He was born May 18, 1980.
A celebration of life for Jerome will be held from 1 to 5 p.m. on Sept. 1 at the VFW, 349 S. Walker Way, Sun Prairie.
